column4: Hi all. Reformatted laptop and installed XP, then Ubuntu 10.04, and now cannot boot into windows at all, it just keeps rebooting in a loop, help please!!!
Can anyone help please? I cannot boot windows after installing Ubuntu, YES I googled it and couldn't make anything out
be more clear. xp does boot but then 'crashes/reboots' or what exactly?
you could always make a custome grub2 entry for your xp partition that  you can set however it needs to be
